solution_line_template: If Coco used his oven {hours_used} hours last month and its energy consumption is {consumption_rate_per_hour} kW per hour, then we consumed a total of {hours_used}*{consumption_rate_per_hour}= <<{hours_used}*{consumption_rate_per_hour}={total_consumption_kW}>>{total_consumption_kW} kW on his oven last month

If the price of electricity is ${price_per_kW} per kW, then {total_consumption_kW} kW would cost = ${price_per_kW}*{total_consumption_kW} = $<<{price_per_kW}*{total_consumption_kW}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
